mapper.select: select * from member order by member_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into member(member_no, member_name, member_id, member_pw, member_contact, member_email, member_birth, member_post, member_address1, member_address2) values(member_seq.nextval, #{memberName}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberContact}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberPost}, #{memberAddress1}, #{memberAddress2})
